application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) Sample of cladding to new ventilation flue enclosure to lightwell B; b) Full details and schedule of works regarding repairs and cleaning to main facades. Such details should include a sample panel to show degree/intensity of cleaning; c)  New external signage at a scale of 1:10, including section. Materials and finishes should match the details hereby approved; d) Colour and finish of external shopfronts and associated joinery; e) New infill make up, covering and louvre lantern in lightwell A, at a scale of 1:20; f) Detailed design of all new staircases at a scale of 1:20; g) The extent and form of any alterations to the internal historic wall and window within the F&B unit) of Listed Building consent LB/24/05041 (Variation of Decision Notice of listed building consent LB/24/00879 (Change of use of existing retail unit to Class E at ground and low ground floor level) to address two minor amendments as follows: For the Condition numbers to be added to the Decision Notice and that the full list of approved drawings agreed with the Council are added to the Decision Notice)
